typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		JOB_NAME as string,
		SOURCESYSTEM as string,
		LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		LAST_RUN_CLOSING as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'table',
	tableName: 'EXTR_LAST_RUN_INFO',
	schemaName: 'SHARED',
	store: 'snowflake') ~> source
source filter(JOB_NAME=='MX01_MXDM_SMALL_TABLES') ~> Filter
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
Filter derive(LAST_RUN_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn1
